mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN as isStockIncomeGrowthPlan, a.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, a.SIGNATURE_DATE as signatureDate, a.SIGNATURE as signature, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN , ACCOUNT_NAME , SIGNATURE_DATE , SIGNATURE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{isStockIncomeGrowthPlan} , #{accountName} , #{signatureDate} , #{signature} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN ,
ACCOUNT_NAME ,
SIGNATURE_DATE ,
SIGNATURE ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN = #{isStockIncomeGrowthPlan} ,
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} ,
SIGNATURE_DATE = #{signatureDate} ,
SIGNATURE = #{signature} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN , ACCOUNT_NAME , SIGNATURE_DATE , SIGNATURE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.isStockIncomeGrowthPlan} , #{item.accountName} , #{item.signatureDate} , #{item.signature} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN = #{item.isStockIncomeGrowthPlan} , ACCOUNT_NAME = #{item.accountName} , SIGNATURE_DATE = #{item.signatureDate} , SIGNATURE = #{item.signature} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , IS_STOCK_INCOME_GROWTH_PLAN = #{isStockIncomeGrowthPlan} , ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} , SIGNATURE_DATE = #{signatureDate} , SIGNATURE = #{signature} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_CO_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
